Name: Hypothesis Lesson for Kids: Definition & Examples
Subject: ['baby food', 'family and parenting', 'babies and toddlers', 'homework and study tips', 'education', 'food and drink']
Description: Doing science experiments can be fun! But before you start your experiment, you need to make a hypothesis. In this lesson, you'll read about an experiment about mold growing on food. You'll also learn what a hypothesis is and how you can make one.
